title: Tallgrass Prairie National Preserve: Schedule Of Events
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Schedule Of Events              Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 2 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Tallgrass Prairie National Preserve Labor Day Weekend Quilt Show & Activities      Time: 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM Location: Ranch headquarters Fees: Free     Saturday, September 3, 2016 Quilt show all three days and a barn dance on Saturday afternoon. Visitors will vote for their favorite quilt with winner announced on Monday, September 5th.  View Details      Tallgrass Prairie National Preserve Prairie Wildflower Day      Time: 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM Location: Tallgrass Prairie National Preserve Fees: Free     Saturday, September 10, 2016 Enjoy a day of wildflower hikes, prairie bus tours, yarn dying demonstrations using plants, and kid's fun. View Details               Ranger giving a prairie bus tour   Check out the calendar for 2016 Centennial events and activities at the preserve.
